entry.content: A powerful, lightweight password manager you will actually *want* to use.

entry.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
entry.content: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

entry.title: dk8moore/teensy-pins-helper: A lightweight, browser-based tool that helps developers quickly visualize and configure pins for Teensy microcontroller projects. This tool simplifies the process of pin selection and peripheral assignment while automatically detecting potential conflicts.
entry.content: A lightweight, browser-based tool that helps developers quickly visualize and configure pins for Teensy microcontroller projects. This tool simplifies the process of pin selection and peripheral assignment while automatically detecting potential conflicts.

entry.title: bukhtyarhaider/HummiGrab: HummGrab is a fast and lightweight YouTube downloader inspired by the speed and efficiency of a hummingbird. It allows users to easily download YouTube videos in various formats and resolutions. Designed for simplicity and performance, HummGrab ensures a smooth and user-friendly experience.
entry.content: HummGrab is a fast and lightweight YouTube downloader inspired by the speed and efficiency of a hummingbird. It allows users to easily download YouTube videos in various formats and resolutions. Designed for simplicity and performance, HummGrab ensures a smooth and user-friendly experience.

entry.content: Lightweight and FOSS browser library bringing Privacy Portal features to your website users

entry.title: dorinemae/elementor-cache-sync: Elementor Cache & Sync Helper is a lightweight WordPress plugin that adds a one-click admin bar button to clear Elementor cache and sync the library automatically. It streamlines workflow by triggering both actions 2 seconds apart, eliminating the need to navigate through Elementor’s settings manually.
entry.content: Elementor Cache & Sync Helper is a lightweight WordPress plugin that adds a one-click admin bar button to clear Elementor cache and sync the library automatically. It streamlines workflow by triggering both actions 2 seconds apart, eliminating the need to navigate through Elementor’s settings manually.

entry.title: neuroborus/ethers-tools: ethers-tools is a zero-dependency lightweight JavaScript/TypeScript library built on top of ethers.js designed to simplify smart contract interactions and multicall3 aggregation on the Ethereum blockchain and compatible EVM networks.
entry.content: ethers-tools is a zero-dependency lightweight JavaScript/TypeScript library built on top of ethers.js designed to simplify smart contract interactions and multicall3 aggregation on the Ethereum blockchain and compatible EVM networks.

entry.title: Christopher-Totlyakov/OnlineMovieAPI: What we created with Cloudflare Worker is a Serverless Function running on Cloudflare's edge network. It acts as a lightweight API proxy that processes requests from the React app, fetches data from the OMDb API, and returns the response. This approach enhances security by hiding the API key and improves performance.
entry.content: What we created with Cloudflare Worker is a Serverless Function running on Cloudflare's edge network. It acts as a lightweight API proxy that processes requests from the React app, fetches data from the OMDb API, and returns the response. This approach enhances security by hiding the API key and improves performance.
